search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Ecwid by Lightspeed (ecwid.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Ecwid by Lightspeed is available at: [https://www.ecwid.com/pricing](https://www.ecwid.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Ecwid Pricing - Choose the right Ecwid plan for your business!

extracted_content.content:
Ecommerce made easy for every stage of your business
----------------------------------------------------

Choose the perfect plan to support your business from its first steps to the big leagues.

Annual (save 16%)

Monthly

### Venture

For solo visionaries

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 303030424801440 252525354001200 € /month

[Get started](https://my.ecwid.com/cp/?pay=Venture&period=month#register)

**All the Starter goodies, plus:**

*   Up to 100 products + e-goods
*   Selling on Instagram & Facebook
*   Mobile store management app
*   Live chat support
*   Access to App Market
*   Automated tax calculations
*   Discount coupons
*   Custom checkout
*   Buy a custom domain
*   Built-in reports & analytics

### Business

For small but mighty teams

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 555555808552700 454545657152250 € /month

[Get started](https://my.ecwid.com/cp/?pay=Business&period=month#register)

**All the Venture goodies, plus:**

*   Up to 2,500 products
*   Selling on marketplaces
*   Selling subscriptions
*   Add staff (2 accounts)
*   Phone support
*   Abandoned carts recovery
*   Wholesale prices
*   Multi-lingual store
*   Promotions, aka planned sales events (3)
*   Custom URL slugs
*   Product reviews
*   Advanced reports & analytics

### Unlimited

For established businesses focused on growth

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 13013013019021006800 10510510516017505700 € /month

[Get started](https://my.ecwid.com/cp/?pay=Unlimited&period=month#register)

**All the Business goodies, plus:**

*   Unlimited products
*   Sell in-person (POS integration)
*   Unlimited Staff accounts
*   Priority Support
*   Promotions (500)

Ecwid collects the US sales tax in states where it's required by law. All prices on this page do not include taxes.

**Current Ecwid customers:** Please note that your subscription price will increase to the amounts listed above, starting next month.

Let’s break it down
-------------------

Annual (save 16%)

Monthly

Starter

[Get started](https://my.ecwid.com/cp/#register)

Venture

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 303030424801440 252525354001200 €  per month

[Get started](https://my.ecwid.com/cp/?pay=Venture&period=month#register)

Business

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 555555808552700 454545657152250 €  per month

[Get started](https://my.ecwid.com/cp/?pay=Business&period=month#register)

Unlimited

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 13013013019021006800 10510510516017505700 €  per month

[Get started](https://my.ecwid.com/cp/?pay=Unlimited&period=month#register)

Starter

Venture

Business

Unlimited

Monthly price

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 555899450 €

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 303030424801440 €

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 555555808552700 €

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 13013013019021006800 €

Monthly price, paid annually

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 555899450 €

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 252525354001200 €

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 454545657152250 €

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 10510510516017505700 €

Transaction fees

Fees charged per sale by Ecwid

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 0 €

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 0 €

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 0 €

$ MX$ £ AU$ ₹ 0 €

ECOMMERCE WEBSITE

Add a store to any website

Adding an Ecwid store to an existing website built on WordPress, Wix, Squarespace, or any other platform

Sell simultaneously on multiple sites

Adding an Ecwid store to several sites and managing all products and orders from a single account

Instant Site builder

A code-free website builder to set up your ecommerce site from scratch

70+ site templates

Pre-designed website layouts tailored to various niches. Fully customizable.

Additional Instant Site pages

Pages beyond products and categories (such as Blogs, FAQs, and more) to build a multi-page website

3

10

100

DOMAINS

Free company.site domain (TLS certificate included)

A default domain in the form of mystore.company.site (you can change the “mystore” part)

Connect an existing domain

Connecting a domain purchased from a third-party registrar

Buy a custom domain (TLS certificate and WHOIS privacy service included)

Purchasing a custom domain from the Ecwid admin, with automatic setup included

Custom URL slugs for products and categories

A URL slug is the end part of a URL that identifies the specific page (e.g., store.com/products/plush-toy). Custom slugs help improve your SEO.

OTHER SALES CHANNELS

Linkup (link-in-bio ecom page)

A link-in-bio microsite with links to your social media accounts, content and products

[Facebook shop](https://support.ecwid.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005892705-Connecting-Ecwid-online-store-to-Facebook-by-Meta) (limited countries)

A shop integrated into your Facebook business page, with the ability to tag products directly in your posts

[Instagram store](https://support.ecwid.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000629245-Tagging-products-on-Instagram-by-Meta) (limited countries)

A shop integrated into your Instagram business page, with the ability to tag products directly in your posts

Mobile point of sale

The app lets you accept cash payments when selling in person at fairs, shows, etc. It syncs with your Ecwid store to help track the inventory.

Sell on marketplaces (via third-party apps, additional fees may apply)

Syncing your Ecwid catalog with Amazon, eBay, Walmart, etc., to sell on marketplaces and manage products and orders from your Ecwid admin

Lightspeed Retail POS

Syncing your Ecwid catalog with Lightspeed Retail POS to accept orders online and in-store

POS: Square, Clover  
(Available in limited countries)

Syncing your Ecwid catalog with a POS to accept orders online and in-store

MARKET

Meta pixel

Setting up the Meta Tag on your Ecwid store to monitor the performance of your Meta ads and run remarketing ads

Google advertising

Setting up the [Google Ads](https://support.ecwid.com/hc/en-us/articles/207100609-Setting-up-Google-Ads-conversion-tracking#-step-2--adding-google-ads-codes-to-your-ecwid-store) code on your Ecwid store to monitor the performance of your Google ads and run remarketing ads

Pinterest advertising

Setting up the Pinterest Tag on your Ecwid store to monitor the performance of your Pinterest ads and run remarketing ads

Snapchat advertising

Setting up the Snap Pixel on your Ecwid store to monitor the performance of your Snap ads and run remarketing ads

Meta advertising

Running ads on Facebook and/or Instagram featuring products from your Ecwid catalog

TikTok advertising

Running ads on TikTok featuring products from your Ecwid catalog

Discount coupons

Exclusive codes customers can apply at checkout to get discounts on their purchases

Promotions

A scheduled sale with a percentage or fixed discount on products or categories. Prices update automatically at the start and return to normal afterward.

3 promotions

500 promotions

Abandoned cart emails

Automated emails that remind customers about their unfinished orders

Automated email marketing

Automatically sent emails in respond to specific events (e.g., a customer favorited a product but didn’t buy it), making them timely and increasing the chance of a purchase

Mailchimp integration

Syncing your Ecwid store with Mailchimp’s email platform to build an email list and send personalized offers tailored to customer’s purchase history

MANAGE

Tax invoices

GeneratIng tax invoices automatically or manually

Customer management dashboard

A dedicated dashboard with customer info and purchase history. You can edit, delete, filter, search profiles, and view all orders from a specific customer.

Scheduled order pickup or delivery

Allowing customers to select their preferred date and time for order pickup or local delivery

Automated tax calculations

Ecwid calculates tax rates based on your store and customer locations, automatically applying the correct rate at checkout according to local tax laws

Built-in reports & analytics

Analyze your business and use the data to improve it. Track visitors, orders, finances, and more.

Inventory tracking (Products)

Monitoring product quantities and receiving alerts for low stock levels

Inventory tracking plus (Product options and variations)

Tracking stock levels of product options and their variations

Wholesale pricing groups

Grouping your wholesale clients to offer exclusive storewide discounts specifically for group members

Dimensional weight calculation for shipping rates

Providing accurate product dimensions to ensure precise carrier-calculated shipping rates for your customers

Staff accounts

Providing staff members with access to your Ecwid store admin. You can assign specific permissions to each team member.

2

Unlimited

MOBILE

Mobile responsive shopping cart

Your online store is mobile-friendly for smooth shopping on any device

Apple Wallet Order Tracking (for customers)

Сustomers can opt to track their order in Apple Wallet. They'll receive push notifications about order status updates.

Android and iOS store management app

The app lets you set up, edit, and manage your Ecwid store on mobile

FEATURES

Number of products

The total number of items you can include in your Ecwid product catalog

5

100

2500

Unlimited

Digital goods

Sell downloadable items like e-books, photos, music, videos, etc. Upload a file, and customers get a unique download link after purchase.

25GB per file

25GB per file

25GB per file

Unlimited bandwidth

Ecwid stores are hosted on fast, global servers with no bandwidth limits for quick loading

One-tap checkout with Apple Pay and Google Pay

Letting customers pay for orders in your Ecwid store with one tap. (Your store should be connected to either Lightspeed Payments or Stripe.)

GDPR compliance

A set of tools to help your store stay compliant with data privacy laws

Gift cards

Offering electronic gift cards in any amount of your choice

Access to App Market with extensions

A variety of free and paid apps to customize your Ecwid store with additional functionality

Pre-orders

Letting customers order products that are currently out of stock

Advanced SEO tools

A set of tools designed to enhance your store's search engine rankings

Pay What You Want

Letting customers name their price for your products; great for donations, too

Custom fields at checkout

Custom fields let you collect extra info like tax IDs, order notes, or other customer information at checkout

Product reviews

Collecting and displaying customer reviews for the products in your Ecwid store

Product filters

Customers can refine their product search by price, category, SKU, availability, offers, brand, color, size, and more

Product variations

Variations refer to combinations of options, such as size, color, or material, available for this product

Product videos

Including videos in your product gallery alongside images

Manually create orders

Creating orders on behalf of customers is useful for phone sales, events, or craft fairs

Multilingual catalog

Displaying your catalog in multiple languages. Shoppers choose their preferred option with a language switcher.

Recurring subscriptions

Billing customers on a recurring schedule for subscription-based products and services (via Lightspeed Payments or Stripe)

Customer groups

Labels you assign to customers to group them and offer an exclusive discount

SUPPORT

Email

Get email answers to your questions

Chat

Immediate assistance via chat. Available 24 hours, Monday to Friday.

Phone

Call-backs are available 2PM-10PM PDT, Monday-Friday in English. Scheduling via chat is required

Priority support

Support requests are prioritized higher in the queue

Store customization (on annual plans)

Customizing your online store with tailored features, integrations, and solutions

2 hours

6 hours

Best in class
-------------

![Image 1: Nomi: alt attribute](https://don16obqbay2c.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/ShoppingCart_Leader_Leader-1-1703663095.png)

![Image 2: Nomi: alt attribute](https://don16obqbay2c.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/ShoppingCart_BestUsability_Total-1703663094.png)

![Image 3: Nomi: alt attribute](https://don16obqbay2c.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/ShoppingCart_BestResults_Total-1703663092.png)

![Image 4: Nomi: alt attribute](https://don16obqbay2c.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/E-CommercePlatforms_MostImplementable_Total-1-1703663091.png)

![Image 5: Nomi: alt attribute](https://don16obqbay2c.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/E-CommercePlatforms_BestRelationship_Total-1-1703663090.png)

### How is Ecwid different from other ecommerce platforms?

You can easily add Ecwid to your existing website. Ecwid is very intuitive–no prior experience with ecommerce or tech skills is needed.  
Plus, there are no transaction fees to worry about.

### Are there setup or transaction fees?

No, we don’t charge any setup or transaction fees on any of our plans.

### Can I change or cancel plans?

Yes, all our plans are month-to-month with no long-term commitments, so you’re free to change your plan whenever it suits you.

### Do you charge bandwidth or storage fees?

No, all Ecwid plans come with unlimited bandwidth and storage at no extra cost.

### Can I use my own domain name or an existing site?

Absolutely! Your Ecwid store can be added to an existing website. You can also connect your existing domain to Ecwid.

### Is Ecwid secure?

At Ecwid, your customers’ payment information is always safe. All sensitive data is securely transmitted through an HTTPS channel. Plus, Ecwid is a [PCI DSS validated Level 1 Service Provider](https://support.ecwid.com/hc/en-us/articles/207100549-Security-in-Ecwid#pcidss) — the gold standard for ecommerce solutions around the world.

### What payment options do you support?

Ecwid works with over 70 payment providers worldwide, including PayPal and Stripe, so there’s a great chance we support your favorite option.

### Do you offer any discounts for nonprofit organizations?

Yes. [Tell us more](https://lightspeed-commerce.typeform.com/to/fsYPIJ?typeform-source=ecommerce-store.typeform.com) about your nonprofit and get 6 months of Venture for free.

View Ecwid E-commerce Pricing to get started! Sell on any website or device with our shopping cart - for free.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Ecwid offers a free tier and subscription plans with no transaction fees. Annual plans provide a 16% discount.

features: Add a store to any website

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For established businesses focused on growth.

promotional_offers.offer_description: Nonprofit organizations can get 6 months of Venture for free.
